about_the_game:
The entire soundtrack for POPGOES Arcade, an official RPG spinoff of the Five Nights at Freddy's series!

Includes 20 songs from both game chapters (POPGOES: The Dead Forest & POPGOES and The Machinist) in MP3 format. 18 of the included tracks are composed by Kane Carter (me), with two ambient tracks contributed by Sian Mewburn (Turntail) and Damon Young (Radiarc).

Includes some spoilers, I suppose!

Includes some spoilers, I suppose!

name: POPGOES Arcade Soundtrack
short_description: The entire soundtrack for POPGOES Arcade, an official RPG spinoff of the Five Nights at Freddy's series, is now available!
